1.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Monica is at the kitchen table and Chandler is in the
living room.

lines.Line:
Do you realize that four weeks from today we’re getting married?
Four weeks baby!! Four weeks!!
Do you realize you get louder each week
There’s still so much to do. Have you written your vows yet

I figured I’d buy those. Pat, I’d like to buy a vow.
(Laughs
Sweetie, you know I have no sense of humor when it comes to the wedding
Sweetie, you know I have no sense of humor when it comes to the wedding
Right. So uh, have you written yours yet
No! But I know exactly what I’m going to say
Do you happen to know what I’m going to say
Do you happen to know what I’m going to say

(handing him a pad of paper and a pen) Let’s just do it right now.
Okay? It won’t be hard. Just say what’s in your heart. (She goes back, sits
down, and starts feverishly writing.
(watching in her) (in his head) Look at her go! She must love me more than I love her! What’s wrong with me? Ooh, don’t open that door

2.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Monica has hit a writer’s block as Rachel and
Phoebe enter.

lines.Line:
You have to help me! I’m supposed to be writing my vows and all I
have is this! (Shows them what she’s been working on.
Well, I like the pretty little drawing of you in the wedding dress
Yeah, except your breasts look kinda small. (Points.
Those are my eyes! Those are my breasts. (Points.

Well, why don’t you just start with something simple. Like umm,
Monica from the moment I met you, I knew I loved you
Yeah, I’m not sure I can do that

lines.Character:
[Flashback to when Chandler was introduced to Monica in The One With The Thanksgiving
Flashbacks
lines.Line:
Flashback to when Chandler was introduced to Monica in The One With The Thanksgiving
Flashbacks.

Okay. Okay. Okay. Umm, maybe you can start with, "Chandler, even
though we were friends; there was a part of me that always knew I wanted more.

lines.Character: [Flashback to The One With The Jellyfish, Chandler and Monica are lying on the beach
lines.Line: Flashback to The One With The Jellyfish, Chandler and Monica are lying on the beach.

All right, there’s a nuclear holocaust, I’m the last man on
Earth. Would you go out with me
Ooh, are we allowed to lie in the vows?

Well maybe you don’t talk about your feelings back then. Maybe you
just say something about, y’know, all the things that he’s taught you. Like…
(They all try to think about one example and don’t succeed.) Or all the things you
taught him

lines.Character:
[Flashback to The One With Phoebe's Uterus, Monica is teaching Chandler how to turn a
woman on. They're in Monica and Rachel's apartment and Monica has just drawn a diagram of
a woman
lines.Line:
Flashback to The One With Phoebe's Uterus, Monica is teaching Chandler how to turn a
woman on. They're in Monica and Rachel's apartment and Monica has just drawn a diagram of
a woman.

Now everybody knows the basic erogenous zones. (She starts labelling
them) You got one, two three, four (Chandler is shocked to find out there’s more than
three), five, six, and seven
(shocked) There are seven?! (Points to one) That’s one
(shocked) There are seven?! (Points to one) That’s one
It’s kind of an important one
It’s kind of an important one
Oh, y’know-y’know what, I was looking at it upside down

Well, y’know, sometimes that helps. (She realises what that
could’ve meant.

All right. Umm, you could uh start out with a little 1, a 2, a 1-2-3, 3,
5, a 4, a 3-2, 2, a 2-4-6, 2-4-6, 4, (Rachel starts getting worked up) 2, 2, 4-7, 5-7,
6-7, 7 …7..…7…7-7-7-7-7-7-7-7-7-7-7-7…(mouths 7)! (They both lean back
on the couch satisfied.
Oh, I got it! How about saying something like, "Monica
"…when I look back over our time together…
(writes what Joey said and waits for him to go on) Yeah
Well, I can’t do everything! Look back over your time together
Well, I can’t do everything! Look back over your time together

lines.Character:
[This starts a series of flashbacks beginning with Monica and Chandler in the waiting
room in The One With the Birth
lines.Line:
This starts a series of flashbacks beginning with Monica and Chandler in the waiting
room in The One With the Birth.
Oh, look, twins. Hi, guys. Oh, cute, cute
Oh, look, twins. Hi, guys. Oh, cute, cute
No fair. I don't even have one. How come they get two

All right. I'll tell you what. When we're 40, if neither one of us are
married, what do you say you and I get together and have one
Why won't I be married when I'm 40
Why won't I be married when I'm 40
Oh, no, no. I just meant hypothetically
Ok, hypothetically, why won't I be married when I'm 40
What is it? Is there something fundamentally unmarriageable about me

Dear God! This parachute is a knapsack! (throws himself over the back
of the chair he was sitting in

lines.Character:
[Cut to Ross leaping into Chandler’s Hotel room in London in The One With
Ross’s Wedding
lines.Line:
Cut to Ross leaping into Chandler’s Hotel room in London in The One With
Ross’s Wedding.

lines.Character:
[Cut to Chandler opening the door to his and Joey’s apartment to reveal Monica
standing there with a turkey on her head in The One With The Thanksgiving Flashbacks
lines.Line:
Cut to Chandler opening the door to his and Joey’s apartment to reveal Monica
standing there with a turkey on her head in The One With The Thanksgiving Flashbacks.

lines.Character:
[Cut to Chandler opening the door to his and Joey’s apartment to reveal Monica
standing there with a turkey on her head in The One With The Thanksgiving Flashbacks
lines.Line:
Cut to Chandler opening the door to his and Joey’s apartment to reveal Monica
standing there with a turkey on her head in The One With The Thanksgiving Flashbacks.

lines.Character:
[Cut to Chandler opening the door to his and Joey’s apartment to reveal Monica
standing there with a turkey on her head in The One With The Thanksgiving Flashbacks
lines.Line:
Cut to Chandler opening the door to his and Joey’s apartment to reveal Monica
standing there with a turkey on her head in The One With The Thanksgiving Flashbacks.
Wait, wait, wait! (She puts a Shriner's hat on the turkey.
Look! (She puts a big, yellow pair of sunglasses on the bird.
This is not going to work
This is not going to work
I bet this will work! (She starts dancing and Chandler cracks up.
You are so great! I love you
You are so great! I love you

lines.Character: (Monica stops suddenly and turns around slowly
lines.Line: Monica stops suddenly and turns around slowly.

Nothing! I said, I said "You're so great" and then I just, I
just stopped talking
You said you loved me! I can't believe this
No I don't! Stop it! Stop it! Stop it! Stop it

lines.Character:
(Joey walks in and sees Monica. He freaks out and runs back into the hallway,
screaming
lines.Line:
Joey walks in and sees Monica. He freaks out and runs back into the hallway,
screaming.

lines.Character:
[Cut to Chandler trying to hint to Monica that he wanted to move in with her in The One
After Vegas
lines.Line:
Cut to Chandler trying to hint to Monica that he wanted to move in with her in The One
After Vegas.
nbsp; Y’know I was thinking, what if I uh, unpack here
nbsp; Y’know I was thinking, what if I uh, unpack here
Then all your stuff would be here
Well, what if all my stuff was here
Well, what if all my stuff was here

Then you’d be going back and forth all the time, I mean it
doesn’t make any sense

Okay. What if we lived together and you understand what I’m
saying

lines.Character: [Cut to Chandler entering his and Monica’s apartment  in The One With The Proposal
lines.Line: Cut to Chandler entering his and Monica’s apartment  in The One With The Proposal.

lines.Character:
(He walks dejectedly into his apartment to find it lit with about a thousand candles
and Monica standing in the living room
lines.Line:
He walks dejectedly into his apartment to find it lit with about a thousand candles
and Monica standing in the living room.
You wanted it to be a surprise
You wanted it to be a surprise
You wanted it to be a surprise

lines.Character: (He turns to look at Joey who smiles slyly and closes the door leaving them alone
lines.Line: He turns to look at Joey who smiles slyly and closes the door leaving them alone.
Monica gets down on one knee.

Chandler… In all my life… I never thought I would be so lucky.
(Starting to cry.) As to…fall in love with my best…my best… There’s a
reason why girls don’t do this

Okay! (He joins her on one knee) Okay! Okay! I'll do it!  Oh God,
I thought… (Starting to cry, pauses) Wait a minute, I-I can do this. (Pause) I
thought that it mattered what I said or where I said it. Then I realized the only thing
that matters is that you, (Pause) you make me happier than I ever thought I could be.
(Starting to cry again.) And if you’ll let me, I will spend the rest of my life
trying to make you feel the same way. (Pause as he gets out the ring.) Monica, will you
marry me

lines.Character:
(The crowd goes wild as he puts the ring on her finger. They hug and kiss this time as
an engaged couple
lines.Line:
The crowd goes wild as he puts the ring on her finger. They hug and kiss this time as
an engaged couple.
(yelling through the door) Can we come it yet?! We’re dying out here

Come in! Come in! (Joey, Rachel, and Phoebe burst through the door.)
We’re engaged!!

3.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Phoebe, Rachel, Joey and Ross are talking.

lines.Line:
Y’know, you’re friend’s getting married, it’s gotta
change things
You really think it would be that different

How could it not be? I mean pretty soon they’re gonna be having kids, and then they’re just gonna be hanging out with other couples who have kids. And then maybe they’re gonna have to leave the city to be near a Volvo dealership
I don’t want them to move to a Volvo dealership
I’m sorry, I just…I like things the way they are

lines.Character:
[Flashback to the gang in Central Perk in The One Where Nana Dies Twice, they’re
all going through an old photo album
lines.Line:
Flashback to the gang in Central Perk in The One Where Nana Dies Twice, they’re
all going through an old photo album.
Hey, who's this little naked guy
Hey, who's this little naked guy
That little naked guy would be me
That little naked guy would be me
Aww, look at the little thing
Yes, yes, fine, that is my penis. Can we be grown-ups now

Oh, that's Nana, right there in the middle. (Reads the back) 'Me and the
gang at Java Joe's'.
Wow, Monica, you look just like your grandmother. How old was she there
Looks like a fun gang. (They all look at each other and smile
Ooh, look-look-look-look-look! I got Monica naked
Ooh, look-look-look-look-look! I got Monica naked
(looking) No-no, that would be me again

lines.Character: [Cut back to Central Perk, Monica and Chandler are entering
lines.Line: Cut back to Central Perk, Monica and Chandler are entering.

Well, we were just talkin’ about you guys gettin’ married and
how great it is
Yeah, you can get a Volvo. If that’s what you really want
So we both finished our vows
So we both finished our vows
Yeah, I don’t hear Chandler’s and he doesn’t hear mine

lines.Character:
(They spilt into their sexes and the girls read Monica’s and the guys read
Chandler’s. The girls gasp and groan and the guys laugh hystericall
lines.Line:
They spilt into their sexes and the girls read Monica’s and the guys read
Chandler’s. The girls gasp and groan and the guys laugh hysterically
(To Monica) Monica, will-will you marry me

lines.Character: (Ross points to the explanation and he gets it
lines.Line: Ross points to the explanation and he gets it.
(To Chandler) Oh man, this is hilarious
(To Chandler) Oh man, this is hilarious
Don’t worry honey, we’ll make yours funnier
